thread.title: BRIEF-Boston Private Financial Provided Notice Of Redemption Of All Of 6.95% Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series D

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Boston Private Financial Provided Notice Of Redemption Of All Of 6.95% Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series D
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Boston Private Financial Holdings Inc :
* BOSTON PRIVATE FINANCIAL HOLDINGS - ON MAY 8, CO PROVIDED NOTICE OF REDEMPTION OF ALL OF COâ€™S 6.95% NON-CUMULATIVE PERPETUAL PREFERRED STOCK, SERIES D
* BOSTON PRIVATE FINANCIAL HOLDINGS - THERE ARE 50,000 SHARES OF PREFERRED STOCK, OR $50 MILLION AGGREGATE LIQUIDATION PREFERENCE, CURRENTLY OUTSTANDING
* BOSTON PRIVATE FINANCIAL HOLDINGS - REDEMPTION DATE FOR THE PREFERRED STOCK IS JUNE 15, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2ryPeob ) Further company coverage:
